channel.title: NPC Talking
channel.description: I''m sorry about my topics , but i have forgotten how to do this stuff , if someone can just help me a little i can get the idea of making npc talk , i want them to talk when to click "Talk" to them , not on the head. Thank you i got a project insanity hybrid pvp. Thanks! Alot - and please tell me where about in the files to do it.
